body: I'm not sorry but if you read this comment, you'll have a girlfriend in the next few months. To activate this blessing, paste this in other comment sections 3 times... don't really believe in this stuff, personally, but I figured "hey, why not? couldn't hurt, at the very least."
To those in calling it a "3x scope", it's a red dot. It's an Aimpoint Comp M4.

In rainbow 6 there are few smgs that have any sort magnification and even for the ones that do have it there is only one in the game that uses a 2.0x which is the highest on any smg (not even ar’s use 3.0x sights as they are only on dome’s)
3x scopes are also used on SMGs in rainbow 6 siege but that’s a game so I guess it isn’t much to base on
Wtf.. why is this in popular section
How'd this get into popular section? Anyway the gun in the covers looks cool but who in the world would use a 3X scope on an SMG??
Nice to see our taxpayer dollars at work.
